name: EXPR_TYPE_DEF
documentation: Ancestor class for type definitions known in the openEHR Expression formalism.

type_name.name: type_name
type_name.documentation: Natural language type name of this type as used in abstract rules syntax variable declarations.

type_anchor.name: type_anchor
type_anchor.documentation: Attribute of the openEHR primitive type (or Any) corresponding to this type definition meta-type.
